alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Miami; Pulaski (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 2:14AM EST until March 06 at 3:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Pulaski County in northwestern Indiana... Southern Fulton County in north central Indiana... Cass County in north central Indiana... Miami County in north central Indiana... * Until 300 AM EST. * At 214 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Royal Center to 8 miles northeast of Delphi to 6 miles east of Lafayette, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Logansport, Peru, Grissom Afb, Akron, Walton, Bunker Hill, Royal Center, Mexico, Lincoln, Wells, Galveston, Miami, Erie, Denver, Fulton, Macy, Onward, Clymers, Bennetts Switch and Nyena Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
